title: Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
description: When changing the Open Mode preference to Single Click and selecting both checkboxes, restoring the defaults does not revert it back to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.
OB: The Open Mode preference remains set to Single Click and both checkboxes remain selected after selecting 'Restore Defaults' option.
EB: The Open Mode preference should revert to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared after selecting 'Restore Defaults' option.
SR: Modify the code so that selecting 'Restore Defaults' option reverts the Open Mode preference to Double Click and clears both checkboxes.
